verses.verse: And <S%H1961>when<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H8672>nine,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, I am the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, and be you <S%H8549>perfect.<s%>
And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you, and will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> you <S%H3966>exceedingly.<s%>
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H6440>face:<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> with him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>
As for me, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> is with you, and you shall be a <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1995>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

<S%H3808>Neither<s%> shall your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H5750>any<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> but your <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H85>Abraham;<s%> for a <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1995>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> have I <S%H5414>made<s%> you.
And I will make you <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> of you, and <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> out of you.

And I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you in their <S%H1755>generations<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> to be a <S%H430>God<s%> to you, and to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you.

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> to you, and to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein you are a <S%H4033>stranger,<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H272>possession;<s%> and I will be their <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> therefore, you, and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you in their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> is my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H8104>keep,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you; <S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H2145>man<s%> child among you shall be <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>
And you shall <S%H5243>circumcise<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H6190>foreskin;<s%> and it shall be a <S%H226>token<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and you.

And he that is <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> shall be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> among you, <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>man<s%> child in your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> he that is <S%H3211>born<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> or <S%H4736>bought<s%> with <S%H3701>money<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1121>stranger,<s%> <S%H5235><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is not of your <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

He that is <S%H3211>born<s%> in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he that is <S%H4736>bought<s%> with your <S%H3701>money,<s%> must <S%H4135>needs<s%> be <S%H4135>circumcised:<s%> and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> shall be in your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H2145>man<s%> child <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> is not <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from his <S%H5971>people;<s%> he has <S%H6565>broken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> As for <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> your <S%H802>wife,<s%> you shall not <S%H7121>call<s%> her <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> but <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> shall her <S%H8034>name<s%> be.

And I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> her, and <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> of her: yes, I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> her, and she shall be a mother of <S%H1471>nations;<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be of her.

Then <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H6711>laughed,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> Shall a child be <S%H3205>born<s%> to him that is an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old?<s%> and shall <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> that is <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1323>old,<s%> <S%H3205>bear?<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> O that <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> might <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you!

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> your <S%H802>wife<s%> shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> you a <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H61>indeed;<s%> and you shall <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac:<s%> and I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and with his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

And as for <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> you: <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and will make him <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> him <S%H3966>exceedingly;<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5387>princes<s%> shall he <S%H3205>beget,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

But my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> will I <S%H6965>establish<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> shall <S%H3205>bear<s%> to you at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4150>set<s%> time in the <S%H312>next<s%> <S%H8141>year.<s%>
And he <S%H3615>left<s%> off <S%H1696>talking<s%> with him, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H3211>born<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that were <S%H4736>bought<s%> with his <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of their <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> in the <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%> to him.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H8672>nine,<s%> when he was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin.<s%>

And <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> was <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> when he was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin.<s%>
In the <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3211>born<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4736>bought<s%> with <S%H3701>money<s%> of the <S%H1121>stranger,<s%> <S%H5235><s%> were <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> with him.
